devdoc.author: Jason Payne (https://twitter.com/Neo42)
devdoc.title: A token staking superclass Provides staking functionality to any token contract that inherits it

addStake(uint256).notice: Stakes the specified amount of tokens for the sender, and adds the details to a stored stake object

withdrawStake(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraws the specified amount of tokens from the sender's stake at the specified zero-based index
